query:
INSERT INTO player_mastery (player_id, word_id, times_used, is_mastered)
             VALUES ($1, $2, 1, false)
             ON CONFLICT (player_id, word_id)
             DO UPDATE SET
                times_used = player_mastery.times_used + 1,
                is_mastered = (player_mastery.times_used + 1) >= 3,
                last_used_at = NOW()
             RETURNING is_mastered
